Guides Language Reference Package Index

Packages

This page lists all packages that ship with Emojicode by default.

s
The s package is Emojicodeâ€™s standard library
files
The files packages provides an API to interact with the file system
sockets
The sockets package allows you to open TCP sockets to servers or to create a TCP server socket yourself
allegro
The Allegro package offers graphics, sounds and input APIs to create simple games
